response.overview: Thakur Jagat Pratap Singh is man of principles he is once saved by a unknown women after he falls from an Horse.Jagat Pratap decides to trace the women and finds that she is Jyoti and wants her to marry but Jyoti tells him that she cant marry him being a courtesan.Jagat Pratap had also not accepted marriage of his sister Vidya to Virendra who was not of his status his younger sister Kiran falls in love with Suraj but Vidya warns her fearing Jagat Pratap might not accept it.Suraj is in search of his sister who never comes in front of him but a secretly takes care of him.Suraj finds that Jyoti is his sister but does not know about the whole truth further Jagat Pratap to sees Jyoti turning back a courtesan and will never allow Kiran to marry Suraj.
response.title: Meet Mere Man Ke
